meanings.sent1: The nonuse of the old bicycle led to it rusting away in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The nonuse of the playground equipment was evident in the pristine condition it remained in.
meanings.sent3: The nonuse of the umbrella on a sunny day made it feel left out among the other items.
meanings.sent4: Her nonuse of the new technology was like ignoring a gift waiting to be unwrapped.
meanings.sent5: The nonuse of his talents was a wasted opportunity for personal growth.

meanings.definition: The state of not being used.
meanings.sent1: The nonuse of the spare room made it feel lonely and neglected.
meanings.sent2: The nonuse of the car during the lockdown saved on fuel costs.
meanings.sent3: The nonuse of the forgotten toy box was a mystery to the children.
meanings.sent4: The nonuse of the neglected garden was like letting a beautiful painting fade away.
meanings.sent5: The nonuse of the dusty books gave the room a sense of abandonment.
